sentences.en: A first pair of models were developed in collaboration with T . Wolaver.
sentences.cn: 最早的一对模型是与TWolaver合作提出的.

sentences.en: Close collaboration between the Bank and the Fund is not merely desirable, it is essential.
sentences.cn: 银行与基金会的紧密合作不仅可取，而且必不可少。

sentences.en: Drummond was working on a book in collaboration with Zodiac Mindwarp.
sentences.cn: 德拉蒙德正与“黄道神游”（本名马克·曼宁）合作撰写一本书。

sentences.en: Each major experiment involves strong motions, and dedicated collaboration.
sentences.cn: 每一项重大的实验都少不了强烈的情感, 以及密切的协作.

sentences.en: He constructed a theory in collaboration with his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他与同事合作创立了一种学说.

sentences.en: He was shot for collaboration with the enemy.
Press contract provision provision, bilateral collaboration should last to next year summer.
sentences.cn: 按合同条款规定, 双方的合作要持续到明年夏季.

sentences.en: She wrote the book in collaboration with her sister, ie They wrote it together.
sentences.cn: 她和姐姐合作写成此书.

sentences.en: The company is building the centre in collaboration with the Institute of Offshore Engineering.
sentences.cn: 该公司正与海洋工程学院合建这座中心。

sentences.en: The international collaboration of Chinese aviation industry also is strengthened ceaselessly.
sentences.cn: 中国航空工业的国际合作也不断加强.

sentences.en: The student was paired with a partner for collaboration on the project.
sentences.cn: 该学生与一家合作伙伴配合开展该项目.

sentences.en: The two companies are working in close collaboration each other.
There is substantial collaboration with neighbouring departments.
sentences.cn: 与相邻的一些部门有大量的合作。

sentences.en: This collaboration soon led to another surprising discovery.
sentences.cn: 这次合作很快导致又一次令人震惊的发现.

sentences.en: This poses the biggest barrier to international collaboration in the Asian region.
sentences.cn: 但国际间的合作通常使用英语,这也是国际合作的大障碍.

words.tran_cn: [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

trans.tran_en: when you work together with another person or group to achieve something, especially in science or art
